line_1: Fes que la teva pàgina d'inici sigui com hauria de ser: ràpida, personalitzable, maca i productiva!
link: Vols ProductivityTab a la teva pestanya nova? Prova Pestanya nova ProductivityTab: https://ichro.me/n
newtab_line_1: Fes que la teva Pestanya nova / Pàgina d'inici sigui com hauria de ser: ràpida, personalitzable, bonica i productiva!
newtab_link: Vols que ProductivityTab només aparegui en iniciar Google Chrome? Prova l'extensió principal: https://ichro.me/w
line_2: ProductivityTab inclou gairebé 50 widgets, milers de fons impressionants, i característiques potents com ara:
features: Dozens of widgets including: Weather, Sports, News, Stocks, RSS, Bookmarks, Gmail, Recently Closed Tabs, and more!
Drag and drop customization on 1-5 columns or a grid!
Fully featured voice search and "OK Google" hotword detection
Buy Pro and get dark and transparent themes, live backgrounds, maximizable widgets, hourly weather forecasts, and more
Navigate between an unlimited number of customizable tabs, each with their own widgets
Work completely offline anytime, everything (even the backgrounds) is ready whenever you are!
And hundreds more features! Install ProductivityTab now and check them out!
line_4: Feedback and suggestions are welcome anytime at: https://ichrome.uservoice.com
line_5: Sick of homepage extensions that lock you in and don't let you customize things?  Getting blasted with ads?  Still looking for "the" iGoogle replacement? Looking for a beautiful start page that keeps getting better? ProductivityTab is for you!
